attributes.action: ensure the two new aircraft carriers are both equipped with planes as well as helicopters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been suggested that the 2nd of the new aircraft carriers will only have helicopters rather than the new joint strike fighter.This  would be a waste of money as it severly decreases the capability of the ship. A limited air capability costs ships and lives as the Falklands war showed.
